website_summaries.verdict: This “jelly-pudding” overnight mask soaks in without rubbing off on the bedding.
pros: An offshoot of the iconic Aqua Bomb, this ultra-absorbing moisturizer has you waking up looking as if you’ve had 10 hours of good sleep
The formula is rich but doesn’t clog pores and leaves a radiant glow
cons: There were some reports of breakouts in people not usually prone to it

customer_reviews.title: Buy it already
customer_reviews.text: Dont bother reading these reviews. This brand and everything they make is beyond amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Merlino

customer_reviews.title: I like belif
customer_reviews.text: when u put this on and after wake up my face looks more whiter and smoth
customer_reviews.author: Hana Cui

customer_reviews.title: Too much perfume
customer_reviews.text: I like the consistency of the product, but way too much perfume!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sayer

customer_reviews.title: Goes on Light.
customer_reviews.text: Belif has made a very gentle night mask. It's not to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cream
customer_reviews.text: It's like smearing on water - only it's not wet. It's like wearing a a protective mask that is not greasy or wet feeling in any way. My face is so smooth and I feel like it is firm in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Feels Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Belif mask when applied over a moisturizer feels light and not oily or intrusive. In the morning your skin does feel moisturized and soft. It has no obvious scent which I also prefer in something I’m putting on my facial skin. It is pricey at $34.99 but a container will go a long way especially if you choose not to use it every night. The ingredient list is long but full of herb and flowers as stated. Overall, a nice product that may have long term skin rejuvenating effects. Time alone will tell.
customer_reviews.author: K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Dimethicone and uselessness and pimples
customer_reviews.text: I don't use products with dimethicone on my face but made an exception for this item due to rave reviews and an otherwise awesome review list. It wasn't with it. First of all, I perceived zero benefits derived from this product. It seemed like a pointless addition to my routine. Additionally, as usual with dimethicone-laden products, I broke out. This product caused unusual (for me) painful "blind" pimples on my chin and some very red little bumps on the sides of my nose that looked like bug bites against my olive-golden brown skin. I removed this product from my routine, et voila! A few days later my skin was much better. I just don't see the point of this *shrugs*.
customer_reviews.author: C'est Moi

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: The texture is amazing-- very fun and bouncy! Cool , sort of slime like texture. Every night I open the jar, it looks brand new as the mask re-congeals and looks untouched. Face at night feels sticky and in the morning feels tacky. Face slightly sticks to pillow but does not stain it. Really enjoyed this once I started an acne treatment that was drying my face. It gave my skin the extra moisture I needed. I find this works best as a treatment product for me. It is not quite enough to act as a moisturizer by itself, but does a nice job of boosting my existing moisturizer. I like it but don't love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but didn't seem to make much difference
customer_reviews.text: My wife thinks that this is an OK product. It is easy to smear on her face but the result is a sticky layer. By the time she wakes up in the morning, the stickiness is gone, but it is unclear whether it is because the mask was absorbed into her skin or into the pillowcase (though she did not see any stain or grease spots). She thinks her skin looked the same as it did before application. The directions say to apply moisturizer first, then the mask, which does not make much sense to her. She tried both ways, but she did not see any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Thinker3

customer_reviews.title: Gel-like moisture-packing overnight mask
customer_reviews.text: belif Aqua Bomb Sleeping Mask delivers on the promise of explosive hydration overnight. I use it once or twice a week at bedtime by applying the gel-like mask to my cleansed but gently dried skin. It doesn't take long for it to absorb so you aren't sliding all over your pillow case. In the morning there is no trace of the mask so a simple rinse of my face with warm water is all that is necessary. It leaves my sensitive, rosacea prone skin feeling plump and pampered. I recommend this mask and will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: honestly feels like jello
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for nights when I feel particularly dry or tight. When you scoop it out, it really does feel like jello, but it almost melts into your skin. There is no thick greasy feel, it is not occlusive. You are shiny though, but it's for sleeping in. I have sensitive acne prone skin and the ingredients agree with me, it has not broken me out or done anything other than soften and moisturize. it has a good clean smell as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pugwump

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: Belif Aqua Bomb Sleeping Mask did not work for my skin at all. It is a nice highly scented feeling jelly-pudding and feels good going on. However, I just never got the intenser hydration. I did apply it overnight as instructed and rinsed off in the morning. This just did not work on my face at all. Again I had no moisturization or hydration while using this product. I saw no difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: bjjoggs

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The consistency of this face mask is really interesting. It feels great though. I like that I can just apply it and go to sleep. I seems to absorb quite quickly, so I dont feel like I am going to get it all over my sheets. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and soft. Great thing about this mask is that a little goes a long way. I took away a star because I am not a fan of the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing but not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This jelly-like moisturizing cream does do a great job moisturizing but my skin is very sensitive to scented products so I cannot use this as it irritates my skin. The jar made it look like a clean gentle product and probably is gentle enough for most but if you have super sensitive skin, then you might want something else
customer_reviews.author: R. Song

customer_reviews.title: Jelly like
customer_reviews.text: It’s basically a jelly mask until it dries, which it eventually does. I have really dry skin during pregnancy so I applied it to my chin for two weeks straight and didn’t notice any difference. I still had dry spots like usual and was kinda disappointed. The smell was refreshing though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping mask is great - very good moisture retention, absorbs easily, and sits well during sleep. I feel great in the morning. My main sleep mask in the routine at the moment. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Nice effect
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement after first use and then plateaus. Would be good before a wedding or big weekend. Feels nice and no issues with sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Teddi R

customer_reviews.title: Overnight lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is a good overnight lotion. It has more of a jelly consistency, not creamy. The smell is very fresh but not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I like the jelly texture. It’s very hydrating and moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: marmar

product_meta.title: | belif Aqua Bomb Sleeping Mask | Soothing Face Mask for Dry Skin | Face Treatment, Hydration, Clean Beauty

Formulated with skin-soothing Scottish Heather and ultra-hydrating herb Lady's Mantle, this overnight mask replenishes and revives dull, dry skin with explosive hydration for a dewy, radiant glow.

BRAND STORY
The undisputed authority in hydration. belif combines time-trusted apothecary herbs and modern skin science to create effective skincare solutions
